price: Mímọ́ ni fún Olúwa àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀, Olúwa Ìtẹ́-ọlá tayọ irọ́ tí wọ́n ń pa (mọ́ Ọn).
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
